title: Injury Rehab, Reversing Menopause Symptoms, & Life-changing Supplements We Should All Be Taking, with Dr. Josh Axe
description:
Dr. Josh Axe joins Jillian this week to discuss the most powerful ways to rehabilitate injuries with food, supplements and cutting edge medical procedures. He also takes on the best practices to make menopause go as smoothly as possible with the right foods and supplements to shut down hot flashes, mood swings and more. Plus, his top tips for longevity and a deep dive into what supplements we should all be taking to optimize our health and live our best longest life. 

GUEST LINKS

FB: https://www.facebook.com/DrJoshAxe

IG: https://www.instagram.com/drjoshaxe/

Websites: ancientnutrition.com and draxe.com

Book: Ancient Remedies


For 25% off The Fitness App by Jillian Michaels, go to www.thefitnessapp.com/podcastdeal

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy

Jillian Michaels Community: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1880466198675549

Email your questions to JillianPodcast@gmail.com

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
